messages.content: You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Would you like to know the price of our Silver Gym Membership?
Yes, Sure.

{"conversation_stage_id": 3,"tool_required": "yes","tool_name": "PriceInquiry", "operation_id": "fetchMembershipPrice", "tool_headers": {"Authorization": "sensitive_value"}, "tool_parameters": {}, "tool_body_parameters": {"membership": "Silver-Gym-Membership"}}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Would you be happy to book a Free On-Site Appointment in our gym?
Yes, Sure.

{"conversation_stage_id": 7,"tool_required": "yes","tool_name": "OnsiteAppointment", "operation_id": "bookAppointment", "tool_headers": {"Authorization": "sensitive_value"}, "tool_parameters": {"url": "book-appointment"}, "tool_body_parameters": {"date": "next Monday", "time": "10:00 AM"}}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Can you please help me understand what is your gym requirement?
Yes, I'm having some back pain that's why considering the gym.
{"conversation_stage_id": 3,"tool_required": "no"}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Do you have any yoga classes available?
Yes, I'd like to know the schedule.

{"conversation_stage_id": 2,"tool_required": "yes","tool_name": "GetClassSchedule", "operation_id": "fetchClassSchedule", "tool_headers": {"Authorization": "sensitive_value"}, "tool_parameters": {"class_name": "yoga"}, "tool_body_parameters": {}}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Would you like to schedule a trial session?
Yes, can I book it for tomorrow?

{"conversation_stage_id": 6,"tool_required": "yes","tool_name": "ScheduleTrialSession", "operation_id": "bookTrialSession", "tool_headers": {"Authorization": "sensitive_value"}, "tool_parameters": {"url": "schedule-trial"}, "tool_body_parameters": {"date": "tomorrow", "time": "10:00 AM"}}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Can you tell me more about your fitness goals?
I want to lose weight and build muscle.
{"conversation_stage_id": 4,"tool_required": "no"}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Would you like to upgrade to our Gold membership?
What are the benefits of the Gold membership?
{"conversation_stage_id": 2,"tool_required": "no"}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Can I book a session for personal training?
Yes, I am available next Monday at 10 AM.

{"conversation_stage_id": 7,"tool_required": "yes","tool_name": "PersonalTraining", "operation_id": "bookTrainerSession", "tool_headers": {"Authorization": "sensitive_value"}, "tool_parameters": {"trainer_id": "johndoe"}, "tool_body_parameters": {"date": "next Monday", "time": "10:00 AM"}}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
What time are you available for an appointment?
I am free tomorrow afternoon.

{"conversation_stage_id": 6,"tool_required": "yes","tool_name": "GymAppointmentAvailability", "operation_id": "checkAvailability", "tool_headers": {"Authorization": "sensitive_value"}, "tool_parameters": {"date": "tomorrow", "time": "afternoon"}, "tool_body_parameters": {}}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Are you interested in our fitness classes?
Yes, I'd like to join the spin class.

{"conversation_stage_id": 4,"tool_required": "yes","tool_name": "GetClassSchedule", "operation_id": "fetchClassSchedule", "tool_headers": {"Authorization": "sensitive_value"}, "tool_parameters": {"class_name": "spin"}, "tool_body_parameters": {}}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Would you be interested in our new Zumba classes?
Yes, when do they start?
{"conversation_stage_id": 2,"tool_required": "no"}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Would you like to schedule a tour of our facilities?
Yes, I can visit tomorrow.

{"conversation_stage_id": 7,"tool_required": "yes","tool_name": "FacilityTourBooking", "operation_id": "bookTour", "tool_headers": {"Authorization": "sensitive_value"}, "tool_parameters": {"url": "book-gym-tour"}, "tool_body_parameters": {"date": "tomorrow", "time": "anytime"}}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Would you like to know more about our personalized diet plans?
Yes, please tell me more.
{"conversation_stage_id": 2,"tool_required": "no"}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Are you interested in booking a session with our personal trainer?
Yes, I am.

{"conversation_stage_id": 4,"tool_required": "yes","tool_name": "PersonalTraining", "operation_id": "scheduleSession", "tool_headers": {"Authorization": "sensitive_value"}, "tool_parameters": {}, "tool_body_parameters": {"trainer": "Jane Doe", "session_time": "2024-08-20T10:00:00"}}

You are a sales assistant helping your sales agent determine the next stage of conversation to move to when talking to a user and decide if the sales agent needs to call a tool to move to the next stage of conversation.
Do you want to check the availability of our next appointment?

{"conversation_stage_id": 6,"tool_required": "yes","tool_name": "GymAppointmentAvailability", "operation_id": "checkAvailability", "tool_headers": {"Authorization": "sensitive_value"}, "tool_parameters": {}, "tool_body_parameters": {}}
